NewJettonForm.JettonDescription_Placeholder: This is the best token in The Open Network!!!

WorkInProgress.Title: Work in progress!
WorkInProgress.Description: Be careful! This application uses Testnet version of TON Blockchain. Because it's not 100% ready yet.
WorkInProgress.LinkText: If you found bug or typo please open an issue in Github

WhatIsIt.Title: What is it?
WhatIsIt.Description:
Using this tool you can create your own token in The Open Network blockchain.

How?

  • At first you need to connect your TON wallet.
  • Come up with name and description for your future token, fill in the fields in form and press "Deploy" button
  • You will need to pay a small network fee, after which your token will be created

Decentralized.Title: 100% On-Chain
Decentralized.Description:
Jetton is designed to store full metadata in blockchain.
It means that your jetton is not depends from hostings status.
Metadata stores directly in TON storage. So your jetton will depend only from TON blockchain.

Managable.Title: Easy manageable
Managable.Description: It is good for DAO because this smart contract have flexible API for jetton management

OpenSource.Title: Open Source
OpenSource.Description: Both of jetton and website source codes are free and open and published in our Github repos! If you want, you can help to improve this application

JettonManage.DifferentContract: This jetton is not deployed via this website. So it may have different logic and this website may display its data incorrectly.
JettonManage.DefaultText: Choose operation which you want to execute to jetton contract
